DOC.TEXT: FOREIGN STOCK_MARKETS : Stock index trends in native currencies and in dollars adjusted for currency fluctuations . The dollar-adjusted returns are what U.S. investors would realize . Source : Morgan Stanley Capital International MEXICAN STOCKS * For Mexican investors , things have gone from bad to worse . The Bolsa index tumbled 67.85 points to 2 # 362.03 on Tuesday , its lowest level since early December . The latest selloff was prompted by the apparent kidnaping of the chairman of banking giant Banamex by extortionists . * While unrelated to the political uprising in the southern state of Chiapas earlier this year , the latest apparent kidnaping points_up the risks to Mexican businesses from political and social upheaval . In effect , many investors are now lowering the prices they ' re willing to pay_for Mexican stocks to reflect the return of those risks--a big change from the heady post-NAFTA days .
